25 
26 typedef (FetchRequest or USVString) RequestInfo;
27 
28 [
29     ActiveDOMObject,
30     SecureContext,
31     Exposed=(Window,Worker),
32     EnabledAtRuntime=CacheAPI,
33     InterfaceName=Cache,
34 ] interface DOMCache {
35     [NewObject] Promise<any> match(RequestInfo request, optional CacheQueryOptions options);
36     [NewObject] Promise<sequence<FetchResponse>> matchAll(optional RequestInfo request, optional CacheQueryOptions options);
37     [NewObject] Promise<void> add(RequestInfo request);
38     [NewObject] Promise<void> addAll(sequence<RequestInfo> requests);
39     [NewObject] Promise<void> put(RequestInfo request, FetchResponse response);
40     [NewObject, ImplementedAs=remove] Promise<boolean> delete(RequestInfo request, optional CacheQueryOptions options);
41     [NewObject] Promise<sequence<Request>> keys(optional RequestInfo request, optional CacheQueryOptions options);
42 };
